1. If you're looking to understand the reasoning/rationale behind your permanent suspension, you can submit a ticket to [**Riot Games Player Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/). If it's a behavioral suspension, as I assume it is, chat logs can be provided (although, they would also be readily available in your client). If it's due to 3rd party applications, they may indicate that but not provide any additional information to prevent circumvention of detection systems. If it's due to your account being compromised, they may work with you to reverse some of the punishments (unlikely). 
2. Your experience within League of Legends is governed by the Terms of Use. Within the Terms of Use, you forfeit your right to refunds, except where an exception is made by Riot or where required by law. 

If there are any other inquiries that you have, I would be happy to help you, or you can submit them in your ticket to Support.

If you were punished for toxicity from the Instant Feedback System, you should receive chat logs when you attempt to log into the client. If you don't see them, then the punishment was likely due to something else, or possibly a result of a manual suspension.

If you can't find an e-mail from Riot (be sure to check the spam folder if you haven't), then you will need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support asking for the information regarding your permanent ban.
